lines.text: Jim, your blood's red, same as mine.
You didn't know that before, Huck?
I don't give a damn what the whole world says, 'cause if I'm doin' wrong - well - well I hope I roast in hell forever.
That's a - that's a hex. Now I ain't superstitious or nuthin' - but uh - well - with a friends life, you don't want to take too many chances.
You do a girl tolerable poor.
Mr. Jackson, sir, My name is Buck. And whilst you're here at Grangerford Manor, I will be your personal manservant and valet.
Buck, get me my pistols. Williams, bring me in some punch.
Unfortunately however; women and children will not be admitted to either performance under any circumstances.
I shor don't like this royal nonsense business. Stealin' poor peoples' money. That's - that's down right dishonest.
Well you're stealin' yourself from Miss Watson, aintchya? Now stealin' is stealin', Jim.
Well thay is stealin' and thay is stealin'. But this here - is stealin'.
If any real lynchin's gonna be done around here, come back with your masks on.
Ah that John Brown's an idiot. Who's gonna feed 'em and take care of 'em? Why settin' 'em free - it's a sin.
